TopicTitle: KSP Store: Add some way to purchase multiple gift codes with one order

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure where this should be posted, since it's a suggestion for the website, not the game.

A simple one, really: I was just buying a gift code in the KSP store to share this wonderful game with my friends (and take advantage of the Black Friday discount), but there didn't seem to be any way to buy multiple gift codes in one order. I want to give KSP to more than one person, but I have to go through the whole ordering process multiple times.
Probably should be in the Kerbal Network forum, I guess. Not a bad idea at all, they should make it as easy as possible to give them money.
